main.name: Square bar
main.fullDes: Square bar is a square shaped metal which is mostly used in buildings.
main.process: Square bars have a uniq process of being made.Starting from melting iron bars to making them have a hole inside or not which they are used in two separate fields.

main.name: Angle bar
main.fullDes: Angle bar is a V shaped bar
main.process: Angle bars are made with melted iron bars and with the process of adding addons into it, it can be both soft or really hard.Angle bars are mainly used in 4 sides of elevators.

main.name: Steel bar
main.fullDes: Angle bar is a V shaped bar
main.process: Angle bars are made with melted iron bars and with the process of adding addons into it, it can be both soft or really hard.Angle bars are mainly used in 4 sides of elevators.

main.name: Steel sheets
main.fullDes: Steel sheets are a key part of industries and factories are the key customer for these sheets
main.process: Steel sheets are made with melted iron bars and one of the parts of the production process is rolling the melted iron through roller and then puttingit in a cold water in order to shape.

main.name: H beam
main.fullDes: H beam is an H shaped iron bars which is used in big projects like sky scrapers and malls
main.process: H beam aside from having a different production process, it has a diffrent selling process as well.For example, all the other iron bars are bought and sold based on price per kilogram whilst H beam is bought with price per kilogram and sold with price per a bar.
